review_description: I bought the Coverland Premium Car Cover Waterproof All Weather for my Shelby Cobra, but I wasn't impressed. After a heavy rain, water leaked through the seams. I almost returned it, but my husband likes the other features, so he's going to try a waterproof spray on the seams to prevent leakage. Can't comment on durability after only one month.

I have purchased many car covers for my AC Shelby Cobra over the years, and this Coverland Premium Car Cover has been the best. It fits well and proved to be waterproof. It's also easy to put on and secure. The zippered entry by the driver's door is a great feature. The cover seems to be very durable and I believe it will last longer than the covers sold by Walmart. Overall, I am very impressed and satisfied with this car cover purchase.

I was skeptical at first, but this Coverland Premium Car Cover for my Shelby Cobra turned out to be a great purchase. It fits perfectly and provides excellent protection against the weather. The cover is waterproof and has held up well. The customers service provided by Coverland was outstanding as well. When I contacted them about the cover only lasting a few months, they promptly sent me a new one. I highly recommend this cover for anyone looking to protect their car.

I wasn't sure about this Coverland Premium Car Cover at first, but it surpassed my expectations. It fits great and really covers the car. The waterproof feature has proven to be effective, and I believe this cover will last longer than others I've tried. I initially had doubts, but I am now a believer in this product. The straps and buckles keep it securely in place. Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase.

I was skeptical about the effectiveness of car covers in general, but this Coverland Premium Car Cover has proved me wrong. It fits well and provides excellent protection against the weather. I live in Florida and the cover has kept my car dry during heavy rainstorms. The material seems durable and high-quality. I am now a believer in the importance of using a car cover, and I highly recommend this one.

I was hesitant to purchase a car cover for my AC Shelby Cobra in Texas, but I am so glad I did. This Coverland Premium Car Cover has exceeded my expectations. It fits perfectly and stays in place even during strong winds. The waterproof feature has kept my car dry and protected from the intense sun. I highly recommend this cover to anyone living in Texas or any other hot and sunny location.

I bought the Coverland Premium Car Cover Waterproof All Weather for my friend in Louisiana, and he absolutely loved it. It fits his Shelby Cobra perfectly and provides excellent protection against the elements. He was impressed with the quality and durability of the cover. It was definitely a great gift choice.

Living in Florida, I needed a car cover that could withstand the heat and frequent rainstorms. This Coverland Premium Car Cover has been perfect for my AC Shelby Cobra. It fits well and provides excellent protection against the weather. I am very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it to fellow Floridians.
Perfect car cover for my Shelby Cobra. (Helpful: 2, Rating: 5)
Provides good protection for my AC Shelby Cobra. Highly recommended. (Helpful: 1, Rating: 5)

This cover seems more like layers than being waterproof. It is a good value and fits my car very well. The buckle straps keep it in place. However, it leaks through the seams, and I almost returned it. My husband likes the other features, so he's going to try a waterproof spray on the seams to help prevent leakage. I can't comment on durability after only one month.

This cover fits great and really covers my car. It is waterproof and seems to be holding up well. I believe this will last longer than the Budge covers sold in stores by Walmart. The customer service was terrific when I contacted the company. They were fast, polite, and professional. I have already received a new cover and will continue to do business with them.

I have bought many covers for my Jeep, and this cover has been the best. It fits well, proved to be waterproof, and was easy to put on and secure. The only problem was that it only lasted a few months. However, after contacting the company, I found out that I had an extended warranty. I provided a few pictures showing the material deteriorating, and the company sent me a new cover. The customer service was terrific. They were fast, polite, and professional.

I looked at several car covers for my Hyundai SUV, and this one looked like the best. It fits perfectly, but make sure you use the sizing chart when ordering. However, I learned that it's not completely waterproof in heavy rain. Shortly after putting it on my SUV, we had a severe thunderstorm, and some water did get through, probably through a seam. But I've found that no car covers are completely waterproof, so I guess it should be expected. This particular cover has adjustable retaining straps for the front and back and comes with an extra strap for the midbody to secure the cover under the vehicle. It also comes with grommets for an antitheft cable or bungee cord to keep the cover firmly in place. It also comes with an antenna grommet that you can add and a large nylon drawstring storage bag. One word of caution, if you have a flexible antenna, I followed the instructions for installing the cover which state that it's not necessary to use the antenna grommet if you have a flexible antenna. Well, that didn't work out well because when I removed the cover, my rubber flex antenna was bent and cracked in several places. In retrospect, my car's years old rubber antenna was the original equipment, so the rubber was weathered and hardened. But be aware that you might want to remove any detachable antennas before using this cover. A replacement antenna cost me on Amazon. Other than that, I'm happy with this cover, it's well-made, easy to install, and stayed on my car in MPH winds and heavy rain.

I bought the Coverland Car Cover Waterproof All Weather for my Honda Hatchback car after reading reviews from other people, and I agree that it fits perfectly. We had rain and snow, and my car stayed dry under this cover. I'm satisfied with the purchase and recommend it to others.

I've bought many other brands of car covers in the past, all stating that they are waterproof, but I can truly attest that this Coverland Premium cover does exactly what it states. It provides excellent water protection. I recently had winds over 50 mph, and the cover fitted on my car adheres perfectly without any concerns whatsoever. In comparison to many other car tarp purchases, this brand has certainly lived up well to its rated. I'm truly impressed and satisfied with this car cover purchase. This purchase has proven so far to be one of my best every auto covers over the decades.
review_title: Coverland Premium Car Cover Legitimately a Good Investment of Protection

review_description: This cover is waterproof and it's also easy to dry off after rain. I've purchased many truck covers over the years, and this is the best and least expensive truck cover I have ever purchased. The only downside is that it doesn't have mirror pockets.

I'm very pleased with this car cover. It is fully waterproof and relatively easy to remove and replace. The cover adapts to the shape of the vehicle over time, making it easier to use. I wish I had bought one years ago, as I do not have a home garage.

I've paid lots of money for custom covers that were a pain to put and keep on my car. It was a breeze to put on, albeit I had to remove the antenna because I didn't want to try my hand at installing the grommet. I trained shortly after installing it and it's really waterproof. The zipper entry on the driver's door is a really great feature.
review_title: Great fit, stayed on in heavy rain

review_description: I bought this car cover for my husband's birthday, and he absolutely loves it! It fits his car perfectly and provides excellent protection against the weather. It keeps the car dry and protects it from leaves, birds, and other natural elements. Highly recommended!

I live in South Florida and the weather here can be harsh, especially during hurricane season. This car cover has provided excellent protection for my car against the intense heat, heavy rain, and strong winds. It keeps my car dry and protects it from sun damage. Highly recommend for anyone living in a hot and humid climate.
This car cover is perfect. It fits my car like a glove and provides excellent protection against the elements. Highly recommend!
This cover is good. It fits my car well and keeps it protected. Happy with my purchase.
